name: Another quiz in the wall
description:
ANOTHER QUIZ IN THE WALL

You must open an hole in the wall, developing a path from the left to right... Break the bricks solving the quiz.

24 questions (with multiple choice) for 24 bricks, divided in 3   categories: hard, medium and easy difficulty.

Push button in the brick to load the quiz.

The questions are set within the game, but you can import them from external text file ("domande.txt").
